_xResult.title: I've Been Waiting Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen dress with v-neck
_xResult.longdesc:
Who thrills you? Is there someone who aims to delight you? In this bespoke, made to measure and simply hand-crafted black dress, you will be inspired to live with an open heart, grabbing plenty of attention effortlesly and authentically. You'll have them looking into your angel eyes—one look and they're hypnotized! 

 

You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
